summary: A disaffected soldier returns to his hometown to get even with the thugs who brutalized his mentally-challenged brother years ago.
cast: Paddy Considine|Gary Stretch|Toby Kebbell|Stuart Wolfenden|Neil Bell|Paul Sadot|Seamus O'Neill|Jo Hartley|Paul Hurstfield|Emily Aston|George Newton|Craig Considine|Matt Considine|Andrew Shim|Arthur Meadows|Gill Meadows|Neil Dodd|Benn Dodd|Jordan Dodd|Lauren Dodd|Jenna Winter|Pauline Herbert|Mark Herbert|John Farrar|Maurice Hemmingway|Sandra Hemmingway|Darren Hemmingway|Wayne Hemmingway|Hannah Hemmingway|Leonard Byrne
title: Dead Man's Shoes
